00026 #ifndef SGDMA_H
00027 #define SGDMA_H

00029 
00030 #define SGDMA_ID_VALID    0x12040000
00031 
00032 //----------------------------------------
00033 //             DMA IP Defines
00034 //----------------------------------------
00035 
00036 // SGDMA IP Registers
00037 #define SGDMA_IPID_REG       0x00
00038 #define SGDMA_IPVER_REG      0x04
00039 #define SGDMA_GCONTROL_REG   0x08
00040 #define SGDMA_GSTATUS_REG    0x0c
00041 #define SGDMA_GEVENT_REG     0x10
00042 #define SGDMA_GERROR_REG     0x14
00043 #define SGDMA_GARBITER_REG   0x18
00044 #define SGDMA_GAUX_REG       0x1c
00045 #define SGDMA_CHAN_CTRL_BASE 0x200
00046 #define SGDMA_BD_BASE        0x400
00047 
00048 
00049 #define BUS_A   0
00050 #define BUS_B   1
00051 #define PB      2
00052 
00053 // Use with SRC_BUS() and DST_BUS() macros  to define BUS size
00054 #define DATA_64BIT   3
00055 #define DATA_32BIT   2
00056 #define DATA_16BIT   1
00057 #define DATA_8BIT    0
00058   
00059 #define ADDR_MODE_FIFO 0
00060 #define ADDR_MODE_MEM  1
00061 #define ADDR_MODE_LOOP 2
00062 
00063 #define EOL       1
00064 #define NEXT      0
00065 #define SPLIT     2
00066 #define BUSLOCK   4
00067 #define AUTORTY   8
00068 
00069 #define SRC_BUS(a) (a<<8)
00070 #define SRC_SIZE(a) (a<<10) // 0=8 bit, 1=16 bit, 2=32 bit, 3=64 bit
00071 #define SRC_ADDR_MODE(a) (a<<13)  // 0=FIFO, 1=MEM, 2=LOOP
00072 #define SRC_MEM (1<<13)
00073 #define SRC_FIFO (0<<13)
00074 
00075 #define DST_BUS(a) (a<<16)
00076 #define DST_SIZE(a) (a<<18) // 0=8 bit, 1=16 bit, 2=32 bit, 3=64 bit
00077 #define DST_ADDR_MODE(a) (a<<21)  // 0=FIFO, 1=MEM, 2=LOOP
00078 #define DST_MEM (1<<21)
00079 #define DST_FIFO (0<<21)
00080 
00081 #define CHAN_CTRL(n)   (0x200 + n * 32)   // Channel n Control Register
00082 #define CHAN_STAT(n)   (0x204 + n * 32)   // Channel n status Register
00083 #define CHAN_CURSRC(n) (0x208 + n * 32)   // Channel n Current Source being read
00084 #define CHAN_CURDST(n) (0x20c + n * 32)   // Channel n Current Destination being written
00085 #define CHAN_CURXFR(n) (0x210 + n * 32)   // Channel n Current Xfer Count still remaining
00086 #define CHAN_PBOFF(n)  (0x214 + n * 32)   // Channel n Packet Buffer Offset
00087 
00088 #define BD_CFG0(n) (0x400 + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Config0 Register
00089 #define BD_CFG1(n) (0x404 + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Config1 Register
00090 #define BD_SRC(n)  (0x408 + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Source Address Register
00091 #define BD_DST(n)  (0x40c + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Destination Address Register
00092 
00093 #define CHAN_STATUS_ENABLED  1
00094 #define CHAN_STATUS_REQUEST  2
00095 #define CHAN_STATUS_XFERCOMP 4
00096 #define CHAN_STATUS_EOD      8
00097 #define CHAN_STATUS_CLRCOMP  0x10
00098 #define CHAN_STATUS_ERRORS   0x00ff0000
00099 
00100 #define XFER_SIZE(a) (a)
00101 #define BURST_SIZE(a) (a<<16)
00102
